body.name: YRMJK Retro Game Console, 20000+ Games, Nostalgia Stick , Revisit Classic Games Console, Retro Play Plug and Play Video Game Stick 9 Emulators, 4K HDMI Output, Premium Competitive Dual Controllers
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 30 mins
features: Built-in a large number of classic Retro Games Nostalgia stick - Enjoy a vast collection of games with no need to download or install anything, as long as connected to the TV or monitor can play directly , With 9 big simulators, you'll never run out of options

Two competitive gamepads - Play with friends and family with Premium Competitive level Dual Controllers adapters that are responsive and easy to operate, providing a more enjoyable and fun gaming experience, best competitive gamepads, best new experience

Easy Plug and Play Game console - Simply connect the controller to the power supply, plug it into the TV, and turn the power on the TV to the HD channel, The game list screen will display on the TV, and you're ready to play. [2 controllers require 4 AAA batteries, not included in the package]

Immersive 4K Gaming Experience - Enjoy high-definition picture quality with 4K HDMI output and 1080P resolution, equipped with extended HDMI cable, suitable for different monitors [Only need to have HDMI interface], can be connected to TV/computer/TV set-top box /PC, perfect to meet your high resolution and game configuration needs, and the retro stick supports saving game progress, making it perfect for saving game progress at anytime

Perfect Holiday Gift - Ideal for birthdays, Holiday gatherings, Easter partiesThanksgiving, Christmas, and parties, this classic version of the console is perfect for everyone alike. With a vast collection of games, it's sure to bring joy and enhance communication and feelings with loved ones.
body.description: 2024 Newest Retro Game Console, Nostalgia Stick , Revisit Classic Games Console, Retro Play Plug and Play StickPremium Competitive Dual ControllersRetro Game Console, Handheld ConsoleBuilt-in Two competitive gamepadsContains a lot of gamesSport type handle, Two competitive level gamepadsThe console's controller is the right size, curves perfectly and fits well into the palm, making it easier to unlock more functions while playing games, you won't feel the tiredness of your palms after you play for a long time.Will bring you happy playtime, allowing you to easily enjoy happy, relaxed,and fulfilling leisure time with friends and family !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's ok but I didn't see 9 emulators on this gamestick. I would give it 5 ⭐ but the description doesn't fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for retro game lovers!
reviews.reviewText: I am very excited! It met my expectations for the game plan, with a large number of pre installed games, so there are always some new and exciting things to play. HDMI output provides excellent video quality, and the wireless controller is a great addition, allowing me to play with friends without worrying about tangled wires. Overall, this game console was a wonderful purchase and brought back many nostalgic memories. Highly recommended! And an ultra fast responsive joystick control experience!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted mario gokart and to my surprise it is not 😞 😞
